title: The Cindy Margolis Show
overview: The Cindy Margolis Show was a television show filmed in Miami Beach, Florida, and hosted by Cindy Margolis. The premise of the show was to have a lot of young people party and dance around a stage on which various events took place such as bikini contests. The show was hosted by Margolis and Lance Krall with DJ Skribble providing dance music for the party goers.
